mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (noticeno, topview, memberno, title, content, RECOM, CNT, REPLYCNT, WORD, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, Youtube) VALUES (notice_seq.nextval, #{topview}, #{memberno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{RECOM}, #{CNT}, #{REPLYCNT}, #{WORD}, #{rdate}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, #{map}, #{Youtube})
mapper.select: SELECT noticeno, topview, memberno, title, content, RECOM, CNT, REPLYCNT, WORD, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, Youtube FROM notice ORDER BY noticeno DESC
SELECT noticeno, topview, memberno, title, content, RECOM, CNT, REPLYCNT, WORD, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, Youtube FROM notice WHERE noticeno = #{noticeno}
